Name: Henoch-Schoenlein purpura
Definition: A hypersensitivity vasculitis that is characterized by purpura (purplish plaques)

Name: allergic cutaneous vasculitis
Definition: A hypersensitivity vasculitis that results_in inflammation of small blood vessels

Name: obsolete secondary syphilitic meningitis
Definition: A hypersensitivity vasculitis that results_in inflammation of small blood vessels
